experience.description:
I am chief procurement expert on Sibur PDH -2 project. My main responsibilities are the following: Direct reporting to Project manager; developing of procurement strategy; control procurement costs and risks, schedule of E&M and service for the project according to plan; identifying, evaluating the and selecting suppliers based on quality, reliability and sustainability standards; lead and arranging of price and contract negotiations to ensure favourable price, payment terms and mutually beneficial agreement ; establishing of smooth communication between engineering team and vendors, other internal stay; updating of procurement status; claims and non-conformance management; other tasks to support ppm.
Develop and maintain procurement metrics to track performance, identify areas for improvement and report on sourcing effectiveness.
Implement sustainable and socially responsible strategic sourcing practices, including supporting local suppliers and promoting ethical sourcing.
Stay updated on regulatory requirements.
SAP-SRM Sibur is new application has been mastered.

industries.name: System Integration, Technological and Business Processes Automation, IT Consulting

experience.description:
On this position I was responsible for implementation and development of data-driven approach. I lead Data catalog project based on industrial solution Alation. As project manager I manage gate budgeting and financing, technical backlog supervision and management, hold responsibility for the streamlined working of the project, master the phase gate process and streamline key project decisions. I collaborate with three different project teams and all company functional departments. My intermediate achievements are the following: 
Despite the fact that vendor left RF we (me and my team: two full stack developers, one architect, one engineer, one system analyst), managed to introduce the solution into the company (architecture, access matrix, network interconnectedness, etc)
Main company data assets of corporate reporting based on SAP BO, Qlick were reflected in DC (metadata)
Business dictionary of KPI was implemented 
Data lineage-from report to relevant table, column and etc was built
All reflected assets were described and supervised 
Processes for cross functional interaction between teams have been built up 
Data Catalog - Alation DC was successfully implemented (MAU 1000)
Technology stack: python, OpenApi, Jira, Confluence, React, PostgreSQL

industries.name: System Integration, Technological and Business Processes Automation, IT Consulting

experience.description: As MSR my average financial target fulfillment is 115% achieved by managing the different aspects of subscription and support renewals; preparing the renewal letters, quotations, invoices, and notifications; contacting partner / clients directly to negotiate terms and conditions and render renewal contracts; positioning services and escalating pain points to the Sales and Customer Success team; forecasting trends and suggestions on how those trends can enhance retention rates; bridging between Sales, Finance and Customer Success; refining renewal strategies that proactively engage a client in chopping the churn rates; augmenting the upsell and cross-sell opportunities; working with the technical /Presales and Product teams to receive feedback on the growing requirements of a customer; meeting the desired goals and establishing metric. Additionally I have conducted three webinars for partners in order to coach and mentor partners in relation to maintenance rules and procedures, what's new initiatives, how to use new Support Center web-platform, how to promote maintenance support. Participated in annual partner conferences ad speaker. In collaboration with presales team and global marketing arranged regular external product What's new webinars (15 events since September 2020). In 2019 developed and implemented maintenance renewal partner planning. Launched two (2) commercial reactivation campaigns resulting in nearly 100K USD in revenue.

As area chief, contracts providers department, I have responsibility for arrangement of internal and external contract negotiations and approval. Besides I was in charge of budget issues and and overall management of the division of 5 chief specialists. My tasks included contracts with Big-names in aviation industry such as Safran group (Aircelle, PowerJet), Liebherr, Thales, Honeywell, UTC Aerospace (including but not limited to license agreements, training, component maintenance, ac maintenance, components shipment, leasing and etc). I achieved to pay the debts for the provided aftersales service in the past, to agree with suppliers templates of the contracts to simplify and expedite the negotiations process, to work out and approve several procedures of shipment and return of components  in case of AOG.

experience.description:
I had to conclude different contracts for subsidiaries of Sollers-Auto (custom, transportation, storage) with international and domestic partners to satisfy needs of subsidiaries in logistic service.
As result I should monitore different markets of 1PL - 4 PL providers.
Information must be accumulated, astimated and showed as final decision - beneficial terms of the treaty.
Sometimes I was included in corporate projects to solve internal challenges (providing delivery of exhibition equipment for car show, destroy autos according russian customs legislation)

I was responsible for organization of container transportation of tea and goods from China, Sri Lanka, Japan to Russia by different means of transport, custom clearance, control of execution of commitments by partners due to the concluded contracts, tracking transoprt rates, making up purchase/shipment agreements.

Responsibilities: 
- Search for means of transortation.
- Monitoring and control of transportation.
- Tackling the challenges.
- Cooperation with partners and customers.
- Documentation process.

While my probation period I was responsible for examination of truck transportation agreement, prepariation report documents. 
As result of practical work I became more skilled in organazing of truck transportation
